comments.raw_text:
Steps to repro: 1. Edit a page on the developer.mozilla.org Wiki 2. Embed

js-config

3. Position your cursor before the j in the WYSIWYG view 4. Press "space" Result: The squiggly part of the j stays where it was but the rest of the letter moves to the right Expected Result: The entire j should move I'm on ff4, Leopard. Sheppy was able to repro on 10.6.7
comments.creator: wes@page.ca
comments.text:
Steps to repro: 1. Edit a page on the developer.mozilla.org Wiki 2. Embed

js-config

3. Position your cursor before the j in the WYSIWYG view 4. Press "space" Result: The squiggly part of the j stays where it was but the rest of the letter moves to the right Expected Result: The entire j should move I'm on ff4, Leopard. Sheppy was able to repro on 10.6.7
comments.author: wes@page.ca

comments.text: This is not an editor bug.  Looks like an invalidation bug to me.  I'm guessing graphics maybe?
comments.creator: ehsan.akhgari@gmail.com
